Mob System v4?.description: Spawn custom mobs in biomes according to configuration rules

Lootchest restocking.description: Restock lootchests on a timer with random

Temperature.description: Players must worry about being too hot or too cold

Tribes.description: Players can create/join tribes with each other to disable PvP friendly-fire. Integrates with WorldGuard to prevent griefing

Thirst.description: Players lose thirst over time, which debuffs them according to their thirst level

Mob xp.description: Mobs drop different amounts of experience

Chat.description: Update chat and tab to make it look nicer

Decay.description: Player bases will decay and blocks will return to their original state. Preventative measures can be taken to slow/stop this process for an area

Dungeon replayability.description: Already created Dungeons will be replayable and will not require a Gamemaster to enter.
